name: Toasty Wraparound Seat Warmer For Savanna/Playa Chair

features: Provides full-body warmth for Helinox Chairs, for use while camping, backpacking, hiking, or adventuring outdoors in colder weather
Double layer 100g polyester insulation is warm, light, packable, insulation and polyester shell fabric made from 100% recycled materials
Integrated hood and fleece-lined blanket wings provide complete coverage for maximum warmth
Stows in included stuff sack for compact transport; machine washable for easy care
